name: Skeleton Walk
desc: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses an ability.

name: Nature's Guise
desc: Turns Treant invisible after a short delay when he is within close radius of a tree. Increases movement speed while invisible, and causes a disarming root when attacking out of invisibility.

name: Blink
desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.

name: Scream Of Pain
desc: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.

name: Cloak and Dagger
desc: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.

name: Death Pulse
desc: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units. Passively provides regen for 7 seconds for each unit Necrophos kills.

name: Ice Blast
desc: Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Primal Split
desc: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Reincarnation
desc: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius will be slowed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Guardian Angel
desc: Omniknight summons a Guardian Angel that grants immunity from physical damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter
